TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TreeWalker extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides methods and properties used to navigate the UI Automation tree.

span.span: Provides methods and properties used to navigate the UI Automation tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自動化用戶端檢視[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素以一組桌面上排列在樹狀結構中的物件。UI Automation clients view the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements on the desktop as a set of objects arranged in a tree structure. 使用類別，用戶端應用程式可以瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄中選取的樹狀結構檢視，並從其中一個逐步執行到另一個指定的方向，利用， ， ，，和方法。Using the class, a client application can navigate the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree by selecting a view of the tree and stepping from one to another in a specified direction using the , , , , and methods. 瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀使用可能會造成跨處理序呼叫中，而且不是做為尋找元素的使用效率或方法。Navigating the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree using can result in cross-process calls and is not as efficient as locating an element using the or methods. 如果用戶端應用程式可能會嘗試尋找本身使用者介面項目，則您必須進行對所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]另一個執行緒上呼叫。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Automation.Condition condition) cil managed

param.name: condition
param.span: The view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree that will navigate.

span.span: The view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree that will navigate.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 不相符的項目`condition`跳過時用來瀏覽項目樹狀結構。 elements that do not match `condition` are skipped over when is used to navigate the element tree. 如果用戶端應用程式可能會嘗試尋找本身使用者介面項目，則您必須進行對所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]另一個執行緒上呼叫。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何建構，只有在已啟用的項目之間巡覽。The following example shows how you can construct a that navigates only among enabled elements. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#174](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#174)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#174](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#174)]

summary.span: Represents a predefined containing a view of elements in the tree that are marked as content controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用戶端應用程式可能會嘗試尋找本身使用者介面項目，則您必須進行對所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]另一個執行緒上呼叫。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 下列範例所示正用來建構的樹狀子目錄中的項目樹狀檢視。The following example shows being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree. 使用方式完全相同。The usage for is identical. span.span: Represents a predefined containing a view of elements in the tree that are marked as controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用戶端應用程式可能會嘗試尋找本身使用者介面項目，則您必須進行對所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]另一個執行緒上呼叫。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 下列範例所示正用來建構的樹狀子目錄中的項目樹狀檢視。The following example shows being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#171)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#171)]

summary.span: Retrieves the first child element of the specified .

span.span: Retrieves the first child element of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能具有其他子元素不符合目前的檢視狀態，因此不會傳回瀏覽項目樹狀結構時。An can have additional child elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 結構的樹狀結構變更為可見[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]桌面變更的項目。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保證項目，傳回第一個子元素將為第一個子系傳回後續傳遞。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the first child element will be returned as the first child on subsequent passes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以有其他的同層級項目不符合目前的檢視狀態，因此不會傳回瀏覽項目樹狀結構時。An can have additional sibling elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 結構的樹狀結構變更為可見[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]桌面變更的項目。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保證項目，傳回上一個同層級項目將會傳回做為前一個同層級後續傳遞。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the previous sibling element will be returned as the previous sibling on subsequent passes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement GetPreviousSibling(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement element, class System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest request) cil managed
Public Function GetPreviousSibling (element As AutomationElement, request As CacheRequest) As AutomationElement

param.name: element
param.span: The element from which to retrieve the previous sibling.

span.span: The element from which to retrieve the previous sibling.

param.name: request
param.span: A cache request object specifying properties and patterns on the returned to cache.

span.span: A cache request object specifying properties and patterns on the returned to cache.

summary.span: Retrieves the previous sibling of the specified and caches properties and patterns.

span.span: Retrieves the previous sibling of the specified and caches properties and patterns.

returns.span: The previous sibling element, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if there is no such element.

span.span: The previous sibling element, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if there is no such element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以有其他的同層級項目不符合目前的檢視狀態，因此不會傳回瀏覽項目樹狀結構時。An can have additional sibling elements that do not match the current view condition and thus are not returned when navigating the element tree. 結構的樹狀結構變更為可見[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]桌面變更的項目。The structure of the tree changes as the visible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements on the desktop change. 不保證項目，傳回上一個同層級項目將會傳回做為前一個同層級後續傳遞。It is not guaranteed that an element returned as the previous sibling element will be returned as the previous sibling on subsequent passes.

summary.span: Retrieves the ancestor element nearest to the specified in the tree view used by this instance of .

span.span: Retrieves the ancestor element nearest to the specified in the tree view used by this instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 瀏覽樹狀目錄中的上階鏈結，直到符合檢視條件的項目都正規化之項目的物件為止。The element is normalized by navigating up the ancestor chain in the tree until an element that satisfies the view condition for the object is reached. 如果已到達的根項目，即使它不符合檢視條件將會傳回根項目。If the root element is reached, the root element is returned even if it does not satisfy the view condition. 此方法相當實用的應用程式，取得對參考[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]點擊測試的項目。This method is useful for applications that obtain references to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements by hit-testing. 應用程式可能會想要只使用特定類型的項目，而且可以使用，確定無論一開始擷取哪些項目時 （例如，當捲軸取得輸入的焦點），只將感興趣 （例如內容的項目最後會擷取項目）。The application might want to work only with specific types of elements, and can use to make sure that no matter what element is initially retrieved (for example, when a scroll bar gets the input focus), only the element of interest (such as a content element) is ultimately retrieved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 瀏覽樹狀目錄中的上階鏈結，直到符合檢視條件的項目都正規化之項目的物件為止。The element is normalized by navigating up the ancestor chain in the tree until an element that satisfies the view condition for the object is reached. 如果已到達的根項目，即使它不符合檢視條件將會傳回根項目。If the root element is reached, the root element is returned even if it does not satisfy the view condition. 此方法相當實用的應用程式，取得對參考[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]點擊測試的項目。This method is useful for applications that obtain references to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements by hit-testing. 應用程式可能會想要只使用特定類型的項目，而且可以使用，確定無論一開始擷取哪些項目時 （例如，當捲軸取得輸入的焦點），只將感興趣 （例如內容的項目最後會擷取項目）。The application might want to work only with specific types of elements, and can use to make sure that no matter what element is initially retrieved (for example, when a scroll bar gets the input focus), only the element of interest (such as a content element) is ultimately retrieved.

summary.span: Represents a predefined containing a view of all the elements in the tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用戶端應用程式可能會嘗試尋找本身使用者介面項目，則您必須進行對所有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]另一個執行緒上呼叫。If your client application might try to find elements in its own user interface, you must make all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] calls on a separate thread. ## Examples 下列範例所示正用來建構的樹狀子目錄中的項目樹狀檢視。The following example shows being used to construct a tree view of elements in a subtree. 使用方式完全相同。The usage for is identical. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#171)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#171](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#171)]
